name: Pokémon Cloud White
overview: Description: The story follows the original Fire red story but after that a new adventure will start for your hero across an amount of 5 regions! Features: • More than 75 hours of gameplay • New scenarios after Kanto and Sevii • New regions- Johto, Mangan, Azur • New rivals, evil organization, grapics and menu • More than 540 Pokemons from gen 1 to 6 • All Pokemon catchable • Physical/Special/Status split • New moves and abilities • Increased difficulty • Day and night + weather system • Pokemon World Tournament • Mega evolutions & Mega gems • New ferry and bus system • Additional storyline based on the film "7 samurais" • Johto Safari Zone in addition to the Kanto Safari Zone • "Egg Market" &" Black market"
